title: SkiaSharp.Svg linked out on Android
body:
I'm having an issue where it looks as though SkiaSharp.Svg is getting removed from my build on Android in a Xamarin Forms app, in debug config.  I haven't found out how to force include the library.  Did anybody else encounter the same issue and found a fix?

For reference, here are the crashing and successful launch logs respectively :

```
12-06 09:48:46.857: D/Mono(27376): AOT module 'System.Runtime.Serialization.dll.so' not found: dlopen failed: library "/data/app-lib/appliorange.droid.app-47/libaot-System.Runtime.Serialization.dll.so" not found
```
